population.label: Population
population.source: U.S. Census Bureau, “2000-2010 Intercensal Estimates;” U.S. Census Bureau, “Population and Housing Unit Estimates,” 2011-18

foreign_born.label: Foreign-born
foreign_born.desc: Percentage of residents born outside the U.S.
foreign_born.source: U.S. Census Bureau, American Community Survey, one-year estimates, 2008-18, Table B05002 (Place of Birth by Citizenship Status)

poverty.label: Poverty
poverty.desc: Percentage of population with income in the past 12 months below poverty level
poverty.source: U.S. Census Bureau, American Community Survey, one-year estimates, 2008-18, Table S1701 (Poverty Status in the Past 12 Months)

deep_poverty.label: Deep poverty
deep_poverty.desc: Percentage of population with incomes no more than half of the federal poverty threshold
deep_poverty.source: U.S. Census Bureau, American Community Survey, one-year estimates, 2008-18, Table B17002 (Ratio of Income to Poverty Level in the Past 12 Months)

cost_burden.label: Housing-cost burdened
cost_burden.desc: Percentage of residents paying at least 30 percent of income in rent
cost_burden.source: U.S. Census Bureau, American Community Survey, one-year estimates, 2008-18, Table B25070 (Gross Rent as a Percentage of Household Income in the Past 12 Months)

hh_income.label: Median household income
hh_income.desc: Combined household income in the past 12 months
hh_income.source: U.S. Census Bureau, American Community Survey, one-year estimates, 2008-18, Table B19013 (Median Household Income in the Past 12 Months)

homeownership.label: Homeownership
homeownership.desc: Percentage of residential units occupied by homeowners
homeownership.source: U.S. Census Bureau, American Community Survey, one-year estimates, 2008-18, Table B25003 (Tenure)

labor_force.label: Labor force participation
labor_force.desc: Percentage of population 16 years and older in the labor force (employed or unemployed and looking for work)
labor_force.source: U.S. Census Bureau, American Community Survey, one-year estimates, 2008-18, Table B23025 (Employment Status)

unemployment.label: Unemployment
unemployment.desc: Percentage of unemployed workers in the labor force
unemployment.source: U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics, Local Area Unemployment Statistics

disability.label: Disability
disability.desc: Percentage of civilian noninstitutionalized population with a disability
disability.source: U.S. Census Bureau, American Community Survey, one-year estimates, 2008-18, Table S1810 (Disability Characteristics)

commute.label: Commuting by public transit
commute.desc: Percentage of population using public transit to travel to work
commute.source: U.S. Census Bureau, American Community Survey, one-year estimates, 2008-18, Table S0801 (Commuting Characteristics by Sex)

college.label: College graduates
college.desc: Percentage of adults (25 years or older) with a bachelor’s degree or higher
college.source: U.S. Census Bureau, American Community Survey, one-year estimates, 2008-18, Table S1501 (Educational Attainment)

pre_K.label: Preschool enrollment
pre_K.desc: Percentage of 3- and 4-year-olds enrolled in school
pre_K.source: U.S. Census Bureau, American Community Survey, one-year estimates, 2008-18, Table S1401 (School Enrollment)

homicide_capita.label: Homicides
homicide_capita.source: Police departments of all 10 cities (2017-2018); Federal Bureau of Investigation Uniform Crime Reporting (2008-16); population numbers drawn from U.S. Census Bureau, American Community Survey, one-year estimates, 2008-18, Table B01003 (Total Population)
